info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:48PM EST until February 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations tonight of 1 to 2 inches, with an additional 2 to 3 inches on Sunday. The highest additional snowfall totals tonight and Sunday are expected across northern portions of Berrien County. * WHERE...Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will drop to around zero tonight and again Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
